The U: S. National Park Service announced on Veterans Day 2020 that veterans and Gold Star families would have free access to all national parks starting from November 11, 2020.
The announcement from the park service s: S. military veterans would receive free access to over 2,000 federal recreation areas, including national parks, wildlife refuges, and forests.
Veterans of the U: S. Armed Forces, including the National Guard and Reserves, can obtain free access to national parks by presenting certain identification. The benefit also extends to their families.
The free access program is designed to t: s veterans and Gold Star families for their support of the country and to encourage them to explore recreational opportunities on public lands and waters. The program has specific guidelines regarding the number of individuals who can benefit from the free access.
